description: Practice questions organized by level and category

vocabulary.question: What does 'माफ गर्नुहोस्' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: माफ गर्नुहोस् (maaf garnuhos) means Sorry/Excuse me

vocabulary.question: What does 'शुभ प्रभात' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: शुभ प्रभात (shubha prabhat) means Good morning

vocabulary.question: What does 'शुभ रात्रि' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: शुभ रात्रि (shubha ratri) means Good night

vocabulary.question: What does 'फेरि भेटौंला' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: फेरि भेटौंला (pheri bhetaula) means See you again

vocabulary.question: What does 'कस्तो छ?' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: कस्तो छ? (kasto chha) means How are you?

vocabulary.question: What does 'ठीक छ' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: ठीक छ (thik chha) means I'm fine

grammar.question: Which ending is for first person singular present tense?
What is the negative of 'म जान्छु'?
